version_description:
Landscape mode is enabled on iPad.
Assorted bug fixes.
Correctly implementing landscape mode for iPad.

Bug fixes.
Performance enhancements.
Bug fixes.
Fixing issue with logging in to the watchlist.
Fixing issue with articles not loading.
Fixing issues with logging in and sharing.

Updates to content feeds to include more news and video
Other minor enhancements

We keep working hard to make our app better. Changes included in this release:

- You can now plot charts by price or percent change
- We’ve added tickers to our Latest News feed so that you can monitor market activity alongside real-time headlines
- We’ve added a new video section called SectorWatch, which will provide weekly updates covering the latest trends and developments across the 11 sectors of the S&P 500. Tap on our menu and scroll down under “News” to see the new listing.
- We’ve optimized the way images and charts load throughout the app.
- We’ve also addressed some bugs within Watchlist and login

Thank you for the strong, positive response to our last release! We'll continue to work hard to make our app better. Changes in this update include:

- Extended-hours charting so you can monitor performance premarket and after hours
- Labels alongside our headlines to more clearly identify opinion articles from news stories
- The addition of bulleted links under our lead story. This selection of links, handpicked by our editors, will provide you with a 360-degree view of our top story of the moment

Thank you for upgrading to the latest version of our app! Changes in this release include:

- We now show extended hours data on Market Pulses
- Nasdaq Futures added to the main lineup on our Futures screen
- Minor bug fixes

- Addition of a video carousel in our Top Stories section
- Our new Financial Adviser Center is now listed as a section
- Bug fixes

Thank you for using MarketWatch! We're working hard to provide one of the best financial news and market data apps out there.

- We've introduced a new advanced chart tool on quote pages. Go deeper with market data, selecting indicators, comparing tickers and more.
- Access Virtual Stock Exchange — our popular stock market simulation game. You'll find VSE at bottom of our flyout menu
- Other minor bug fixes

What's New

Thank you for using MarketWatch! We're working hard to provide one of the best financial news and market data apps out there.

- We've introduced a new advanced chart tool on quote pages. Go deeper with market data, selecting indicators, comparing tickers and more.
- Access Virtual Stock Exchange — our popular stock market simulation game. You'll find VSE at bottom of our flyout menu
- Other minor bug fixes

Thanks for using the MarketWatch mobile app!

What's new:

- Support for iOS 11 in-app reviews
- Misc bug fixes and enhancements

Thanks for using the MarketWatch mobile app! We continue to work hard to have one of the best financial news apps on the market. We appreciate your support.

What's new:
You can now add bitcoin to your Watchlist
Live blogs now render in the app
Fix to turning off notifications
Miscellaneous bug fixes and optimizations

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this release -

- Display fixes
- Fix for scrolling issue
- Misc bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using the MarketWatch mobile app! We continue to work hard to have one of the best financial news apps on the market. We appreciate your support.

What's new:
You can now add bitcoin to your Watchlist
Live blogs now render in the app
Miscellaneous bug fixes and optimizations

Thanks for using the MarketWatch mobile app!

What's new:
- Added Cryptocurrency news feed
- Added Explainomics news feed
- Added The Moneyist news feed
- Miscellaneous bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this update:

- misc enhancements and bug fixes

Thanks for using MarketWatch! Updates in this release include:

* New market data strip atop main pages. Easily monitor the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500 and Nasdaq.
* A boost in font size for improved readablity
* Creating a new watchlist now takes you immediately to that new watchlist
* Minor bug fixes

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this release:

- Fix for occasionally getting logged out after a day
- Misc bug fixes and enhancements

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this version:
- optimized display for iPhone X
- misc. bug fixes and enhancements

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this release -

- Display fixes
- Fix for scrolling issue
- Misc bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using MarketWatch!

In this version:

- optimization and performance enhancements

Thanks for using MarketWatch! We're still working hard to bring you the latest in financial news and data!

In this update:
- Fix for Search not returning tickers containing certain special characters
- Fix for Watchlist occasionally containing blank entries
- Fix for not staying logged in over multiple days
- Handle Market Data errors better
- Taps less sensitive - less opening articles after scrolling unintentionally
- Misc bug fixes and behind the scenes improvements

As always, thanks for using MarketWatch!
In this update -
- bug fixes and performance enhancements

As always, thank you for using MarketWatch!

We are excited to introduce our sixth generation app. We've rebuilt the app natively, moving away from a hybrid framework, to make the experience faster and smoother.

Among the changes that you'll notice:

- A refactored design, including updated fonts and colors
- New site navigation that more closely mirrors our website and gives you access to more of our news coverage
- More Key Data figures on quote pages
- Performance tables across instruments and Lipper rankings on mutual funds
- Stock Movers data on U.S., Europe and Asia market data screens
- U.S. Treasurys list on Rates screen
- Bug fix to ads that loaded within the app, and more

We hope you enjoy this latest version of our app. Additional feature enhancements will be coming soon.

As always, thank you for using MarketWatch!

As always, thank you for using MarketWatch! This latest version of the app includes a bug fix for fractional shares. When you edit lots in Watchlist you can now add fractional shares. You will see these changes reflected when you tap "Save Changes" and return to your Watchlist.
